item.description: "You had to go and learn for yourself, didn't you?" A look of anger, panic and fear each fought to control his mother's face as she moved the hair from his ashen ...

item.title: The World Of Niisii
item.description: What was and what will be Niisii? Niisii is the world I have spend the most time on, and know the least about. This is because it started as one thing; something good.

item.title: Welcome To My Table - A Guide For Players Looking To Play At A Table With Me
item.description: Welcome to my table: A Guide For New Players Looking To Play At A Table With Me What is this This document is living and will be adjusted as my views grow and change ...

item.title: Player Guide - Caroline College
item.description: House Rules for Caroline College - An Early 1980's Call of Cthulhu Campaign Setting These house rules are designed to enhance your gaming experience by: Increasing character ...

item.title: Optional Rules - Distress Points (DSP)
item.description: Optional Expanded Sanity Rules for Call of Cthulhu Note: These rules are optional and will be discussed during Session Zero. They are designed to enhance the horror experience in long-term campaigns without incapacitating characters through excessive Sanity loss.

item.title: Welcome To Wisconsin
item.description: Two minutes till midnight in Wisconsin.. The chill of the evening clings to the air outside. You sit alone in your dorm room, staring at the clock radio resting atop your nightstand.

item.title: 'That' Randy's Stuff
item.description: If you were looking for me, congratulations YOU WON. If you weren't looing for me I have to wonder why you are here. Are lost? Do you need a grown-up to help you get home? I'll try to help but I gave up being a grown up a long time ago.
